mapper.select: select wm.id, wm.name, wm.status, wm.content,wm.create_time, wm.deadline_time, wum.user_id, wum.mission_id, wum.level, wum.status as user_status from dust_mission wm join dust_user_mission wum on wm.id=wum.mission_id where wum.user_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into dust_user_mission(mission_id, user_id, level, status) value(#{userMission.mission.id}, #{userMission.user.id}, #{userMission.userLevel}, #{userMission.userStatus})
mapper.select: select level from dust_user_mission where mission_id=#{missionId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from dust_user_mission where mission_id=#{missionId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update dust_user_mission set status=#{status} where mission_id=#{missionId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from dust_mission where mission_id=#{mission.id} and exists (select 1 from dust_user_mission where mission_id=#{mission.id} and user_id=#{user.id})
mapper.update: update dust_mission set status=#{status} where exists(select 1 from dust_user_mission where user_id=#{userId} and mission_id=#{missionId} and level=#{level})
mapper.delete: delete from dust_user_mission where mission_id={mission.id} and user_id=#{user.id}
